Review Title: You need to have nerve of steel to watch this garbage
Review: Movie Name - Student Of The Year 2 Genre - Romance / Drama Rating - Disgusting 0.5 /5Sometimes I wonder whether few filmmakers prepares any script before making a film. Spending so much on location, songs and dance would not give the inception of a good film unless script is thoroughly worked upon.SOTY2 tells the story of 3 friends with the Kabaddi Inter School competition at the background - Rohan (Tiger Shroff) who joins the college for his girlfriend, Tara Sutaria. There is a spoilt brat, Ananya Panday, who thinks she can rule the college with her care-free attitude.Director Puneet Malhotra (I Hate Luv Storys, Gori Tere Pyaar Mein) does not do justice to the area of direction at all. As the movie begins, you are greeted by glossy and candy floss environment of college (reminds you of Kuch Kuch Hota Hai and Student Of The Year 2012 ) with unnecessary insertion of songs. The main drama unfolds in the later reel which again is intolerable with screenplay written surely by a school kid. Art direction and Cinematography is excellent especially. Songs are poor. Dialogues are less-impacting. Performances are over-top. Tiger Shroff does his best but could not do much with the lame script. Glam dolls -Tara Sutaria and Ananya Panday are meant for making the film more attractive.Overall, a pathetic film in every sense.

Review: Disclaimer: No spoilers to give out! You already know the story. Costumes, locations - 10/10 Script - 0/10 Acting - 2/10The movie tries to be Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar really hard but fails miserably. The movie has no heart and fails to hold your attention unlike Jo Jeeta. Tiger, yet again has the same one tone dialogue delivery and expressions and the same goes for Tara and Ananya.The film has flashy songs, costumes and acrobatics galore. The director wants you, the audience to cheer for Tiger, whose body is broken in half in a Kabaddi match(?) but Tiger's lack of acting range makes even that impossible. You could probably pop into the theatre post the interval and still get the story or the lack thereof! So, wait for it to come out on platforms like Netflix or Prime. Save your money!

We as an audience can't anymore critice bollywood for its production of trash, as it is not going to change, nor does Karan Johar. You know, this trash ðŸ—‘ contains everything, remake of a song from the 90s, songs with only noise but no music, expression-less face of Tiger Shroff, body show off of female leads, no proper direction nor screenplay, pathetic story with lunatic performances. Rubbish comedy with fake and improper elevations, no proper storyline, and tiger is just there to show off his muscular skin but nothing else. Review Title: A Movie Which Can Not Be Spoofed

I myself have no problems with star kids unless they are as good of actor and actresses like Ranbir and Alia. This movie is cringe, meaningless and unworthy of your money and time.
